About The Company

AndMine offers digital agency services to customers from all around the world. Digital Agency Sydney - The new office brings the AndMine digital agency philosophies to Sydney offering end-to-end services including; creative, digital marketing strategy, digital marketing agency services, ecommerce store design and development, mobile apps development, and online marketing agency services including social media advertising agency services and Facebook advertising & marketing services. As an Australian web development company in Melbourne, Sydney & Gold Coast they're delivering business advantages online and offline. Digital Agency Melbourne - their Digital Agency's headquarters in Melbourne produces some of Australia's most influential digital strategy and developments. Run by a collective of success driven engineers, creatives and marketers their work and your results will speak for themselves.

My Responsibilities

  • Slicing mockup files and maintaining designs as clients requirement. Modify and Updating pre-existing websites.
